name: K'Sante
title: the Pride of Nazumah
shortBio: Defiant and courageous, K'Sante battles colossal beasts and ruthless Ascended to protect his home of Nazumah, a coveted oasis amid the sands of Shurima. But after a falling-out with his former partner, K'Sante realizes that in order to become a warrior worthy of leading his city, he must temper his single-minded drive for success. Only then can he avoid falling prey to his own pride and find the wisdom he needs to defeat the vicious monsters threatening his people.

skins.name: Empyrean K'Sante

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2022 Event.

skins.description: K'Sante prides himself on leading under adversity, but this is a challenge unlike any other. His realm is gone, he's living on borrowed time, and the other Empyreans don't realize that something released the Foreglow. Something bad. He knows only they can fix it, but they need their eyes opened. They need a leader.

skins.name: Prestige Empyrean K'Sante
skins.description: K'Sante's always been a trailblazer on the fashion circuit, and this year he definitely wants to make the audience sweat. With his crystal-laden drip and flawless makeup, he's about to light a fire under this Gala.

passive.name: Dauntless Instinct
passive.description: K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.

spells.name: Ntofo Strikes
spells.description:
Strike a weapon forward, damaging and slowing all enemies in a short line.

On hit, grants a stack for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, this skill fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.
spells.dynamicDescription:
K'Sante slams his weapon down, dealing @BaseDamage@ physical damage and briefly Slowing the enemies struck by @SlowPercent*100@%.

When an enemy is hit, K'Sante gains a stack of Ntofo Strikes for @RecastWindow@ seconds. At 2 stacks, K'Sante instead fires a shockwave that Stuns and Pulls enemies for @KnockupDuration@ second.

All Out: This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by @CooldownBonusAO@ seconds and no longer inflicts Slow.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Path Maker
spells.description: K'Sante charges up before dashing. K'Sante is unstoppable and takes less damage while charging. Any targets hit by the dash are knocked to the end of the dash and stunned.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Begin Charging: K'Sante raises his weapons defensively for up to @MaxDuration@ second, becoming Unstoppable and reducing incoming damage by @DamageReductionCalc@.

Release: K'Sante rams forward, dealing between @WMinPercentHealthDamage@ and @WMaxPercentHealthDamage@ max Health physical damage based on charge time. K'Sante Knocks Back and Stuns enemies for a duration between @MinKnockbackDuration@ and @MaxKnockbackDuration@ seconds.

All Out: This Ability's Cooldown is refreshed. This Ability will no longer Knock Back or Stun. This Ability's damage reduction increases to @DamageReductionCalcAO@, it deals additional physical damage between @MinFlatDamageAOCalc@ and @MaxFlatDamageAOCalc@, and its charge and dash speed are doubled.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Footwork
spells.description: K'Sante will dash to an ally and both will gain a shield. If there is no ally, K'Sante will still dash to the location at a reduced range and gain a shield.
spells.dynamicDescription:
K'Sante dashes, gaining @TotalShield@ Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. If dashing to an ally, the distance of the dash is significantly increased and the ally is also Shielded.

All Out: This Ability's dash speed is increased. Dashing without an ally has increased range and can go over walls.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: All Out
spells.description: K'Sante smashes an enemy away. If the enemy hits a wall they will go through the wall taking more damage. K'Sante will appear behind the target and goes All Out by shredding his defenses but greatly increasing his damage.
spells.dynamicDescription:
K'Sante shatters his ntofos, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage and Knocking Back an enemy champion. Enemies that hit a wall instead take @TotalDamageSlamDown@ physical damage, are Knocked Back over the wall, and are briefly Stunned. K'Sante then dashes after the enemy and goes All Out for 20 seconds.

All Out K'Sante loses @HealthLost*100@% max Health, @DefensesLost*100@% Bonus Armor, and @DefensesLost*100@% Bonus Magic Resistance. K'Sante gains @AllOutAttackDamage@ Attack Damage, @AllOutOmnivamp@ Omnivamp, and transforms his Abilities.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
